issue.title: [Python] Remove the test usage of legacy dataset
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16481](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16481). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently the parquet tests cover both new and old dataset implementation. The usage of legacy dataset can be removed from the tests as the legacy ParquetDataset is being deprecated.

See https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16119.
